column2: This is AI-only, if you didn't know :P
This is an ai-only event. Not cool of you to be seeing it. Report this to me immediately, no hesitation.

You never paid much attention what your blood was. Such trivialities clogged the minds of ancient doctors and scribes, writers wrote of that more than a thousand years prior. The topic faded away into obscurity when Old Rome fell.
I never knew the colour of my blood!
